c74object.name: mlmat.pca
c74object.description: Principal Components Analysis. An implementation of several strategies for principal components analysis (PCA), a common preprocessing step. Given a dataset and a desired new dimensionality, this can reduce the dimensionality of the data using the linear transformation determined by PCA.

attribute.name: decomposition_method
attribute.digest: Method used for the principal components analysis
attribute.description: Method used for the principal components analysis. (default = exact)

attribute.name: seed
attribute.digest: Random seed if random basis being used
attribute.description: Random seed if random basis being used. 0 indicates no seed. (default = 0)

attribute.name: scale
attribute.digest: If set, the data will be scaled before running PCA, such that the variance of each feature is 1
attribute.description: If set, the data will be scaled before running PCA, such that the variance of each feature is 1. (default = 0)

attribute.name: new_dimensionality
attribute.description: Desired dimensionality of output dataset. If 0, no dimensionality reduction is performed. (default = 2)
